DOC.brief_title: The Role Topically Dissolved Oxygen ( TDO ) Ameliorate Signs Photodamage
DOC.criteria: Subjects must female , 2560 year old good general health ; Subjects must Fitzpatrick Types I , II , III , IV , V Subjects must willing forgo use facial cosmetic ( e.g . facial moisturizers , cream , foundation , blush , etc . ) course study . Subjects may ONLY use facial regimen product provide sponsor ( lipstick , lip gloss , eye mascara permit ) . Known sensitivity test material ingredient . Routine high dosage use antiinflammatory medication ( aspirin , ibuprofen , corticosteroid ) , immunosuppressive drug antihistamine medication ( steroid nose drop and/or eye drop permit ) ( one8lmg 325mg aspirin okay ) ( birth control okay need report ) . Use topical OTC/Rx drug cosmetic test site . Immunological disorder HIV positive systemic lupus erythematosus ( interview ) Participation clinical study within last four week . Pregnant lactate woman ( interview ) . Damaged skin around test site ( include sunburn , uneven skin tone , tattoo , scar disfiguration test site ) .
